Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.17981364]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus CCT 6538 (MIC=40 µM), S. saprophyticus (MIC=40 µM), Bacillus subtilis CCT 2471 (MIC=40 µM), B. thuringiensis (MIC=40 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=80 µM), Escherichia coli CCT 1371 (MIC=160 µM), Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883 (MIC=80 µM), A. faecalis ATCC 8750 (MIC=40 µM);Fungi:Candida albicans (MIC=40 µM), L. major promastigotes (IC50=72 µM).
Sequence Information.Function: Linear cationic alpha-helical peptide that acts as antimicrobial peptide. At high concentrations exhibits activity in stimulating degranulation from rat peritoneal mast cells. Inhibits the growth of L.major promastigotes in vitro with an IC50 of 72 µM. Has hemolytic activity towards human and mouse erythrocytes.

Literature.Title: Decoralin, a novel linear cationic alpha-helical peptide from the venom of the solitary eumenine wasp Oreumenes decoratus.
Literature.Author: Konno K, Rangel M, Oliveira JS, Dos Santos Cabrera MP, Fontana R, Hirata IY, Hide I, Nakata Y, Mori K, Kawano M, Fuchino H, Sekita S, Neto JR.
